name.ja: <ruby>蒼<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>救<rt>きゅう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>祈<rt>いの</rt></ruby>り

requirement.en: Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Special Summon 1 LIGHT or DARK Attribute Celestial Warrior Type monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
